name: branch-change-tabs
description: Opens modified files when switching git branches (excluding configured branches).

commands.title: Branch Change Tabs: Open Changed Files
Branch Change Tabs: Close Pinned Tabs in Active Group

branchTabs.excludedBranches.description: Branch names that should not trigger auto-opening files.

branchTabs.closeAllBeforeOpen.description: Close all open editors before opening changed files.

branchTabs.pinOpenedTabs.description: Pin editors opened by the extension (preview=false).

branchTabs.includeModified.description: Open files that are modified relative to the base branch.

branchTabs.includeAdded.description: Open files that are newly added relative to the base branch.

branchTabs.pinAdded.description: Pin newly added files when opening.

branchTabs.excludeRegexes.description: List of regex strings to exclude file paths from opening.

branchTabs.maxFilesToOpen.description: Open up to this many text files when more are changed.

branchTabs.textFilesOnly.description: Only open text files (skip binary files).

branchTabs.excludeExtensions.description: List of file extensions to skip when opening files (e.g., .pdf, .png).

branchTabs.excludeDirRegexes.description: List of regex strings to exclude directories (matched against repo-relative paths).

branchTabs.closePinnedTabsOnBranchChange.description: Close all pinned tabs when switching branches.

branchTabs.closeAllOnExcludedBranch.description: Close tabs that were opened by the extension when switching to an excluded branch.

branchTabs.promptOnNewRepo.description: Prompt to enable or disable the extension when a new repository is opened.

branchTabs.enabledRepos.description: List of repository root paths where the extension is enabled. If non-empty, only these repos are enabled.

branchTabs.baseBranch.description: Optional base branch/ref to diff against. If empty, uses upstream if set, otherwise main/master when available.
